Useful Information about the ALTA 2013 Shared Task

This page contains some links that you may find useful when attempting the task. More information may be added later on.

  • Baldwin et al. (2009). Restoring Punctuation and Casing in English Text.
  • Niu et al. (2004). Ortographic Case Restoration Using Supervised Learning Without Using Manual Annotation.
